Introduction.chapter_title: The Restaurant Where Everyone Stared at Phones
Introduction.content:
Mama Ntilie had the best food cafe in town.

People came for ugali, beans, and chicken.

But nobody looked at the food anymore.

Everyone just stared at their phones.

Mama Ntilie got very angry one day.

Chapter 1.content:
Mama Ntilie wrote on the blackboard:

Today’s Special → Phone Soup 2,000 TShs

She collected old phones from customers and threw them in a big pot.

![Mama Ntilie throwing phones into cooking pot](https://picsum.photos/seed/mama-phone-pot/800/600)

She added salt, tomatoes, and onions.

The soup started bubbling and ringing.

Chapter 2.chapter_title: Customer’s Phone Starts Ringing Inside the Soup
Chapter 2.content:
A man ordered Phone Soup.

When Mama Ntilie served it, his own phone rang… from inside the bowl!

“Hello? Yes mama, I am eating… literally!”

![Phone ringing in hot soup bowl](https://picsum.photos/seed/phone-ringing-soup/800/600)

The man almost cried.

Chapter 3.chapter_title: The Soup Sends WhatsApp Voice Notes
Chapter 3.content:
Someone recorded the talking soup and posted online.

The video got 10 million views in one day!

The soup even sent voice notes: “Bring ugali please!”

![Soup bowl with speech bubble](https://picsum.photos/seed/soup-talkwhats/800/600)

Mama Ntilie became famous overnight.

Chapter 4.content:
A health officer came and shouted,

“This soup has too much radiation!”

He closed the cafe for one week.

![Angry health officer pointing at soup](https://picsum.photos/seed/health-officer-angry/800/600)

Mama Ntilie just smiled.

Chapter 5.chapter_title: Comeback: Air-Fryer Air with Free WiFi
Chapter 5.content:
Mama Ntilie opened again with a new menu:

- Air-Fryer Air → 5,000 TShs
- Free strong WiFi

Now customers come, charge their phones, and finally look at the real food.

![Happy customers eating and charging phones](https://picsum.photos/seed/happy-cafe-wifi/800/600)

Business is better than ever!

Conclusion.content:
Mama Ntilie learned:

If people love phones more than food, give them both!

Now everyone eats, smiles, and says thank you.

![Mama Ntilie smiling with full restaurant](https://picsum.photos/seed/mama-smile-full/800/600)

The end.
